title: Тайная жизнь верующих
overview: Podcast by Grisha Prorokov about religions in the USSR. Fascinating stories about how faith broke through the asphalt of repression and persecution.Representatives of different faiths defended their right to faith with incredible persistence. After all, the USSR actively fought against religion. From this podcast, you will learn how the country went through a thorny path from atheism to the principle of "religion in the service of the state."
